text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist and fog in the morning and at night. Light rain later. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
